DOC.brief_summary: To assess whether addition Extra-corporeal Shockwave Therapy ( ESWT ) structure home-exercise programme additional benefit patient tendinopathies
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age > 18 2 . Symptoms ( typically pain / stiffness ) least 12 week one follow site / condition : 1 . Plantar fasciitis 2 . Insertional Achilles tendinopathy 3 . Midsubstance Achilles tendinopathy 4 . Patella tendinopathy 5 . Trochanteric pain syndrome ( gluteus medius insertional tendinopathy / trochanteric bursitis ) 6 . Tennis elbow 3 . Referred ESWT ( shockwave ) within Sports Medicine Department 4 . Objective image tendon / structure confirm diagnosis exclude tear structural injury ( US MRI acceptable ) 1 . Patients normal exclusion ESWT include preexist skin injury tendon site , recent steroid injection ( within 6 week ESWT start ) , patient anticoagulation , patient haemophilia bleed tendency , patient current febrile illness 2 . Previous ESWT treatment condition
